body_html: Well you need a compiler with C++11 support to build PyTorch. -std=c++11 is necessary. I haven't heard of similar issues. It's really weird and it might be a result of having your compiler pick up a wrong directory for includes (since you have multiple installed). Make sure you can compile other C++11 programs. We've never been defining such a flag.

body: Well you need a compiler with C++11 support to build PyTorch. `-std=c++11` is necessary. I haven't heard of similar issues. It's really weird and it might be a result of having your compiler pick up a wrong directory for includes (since you have multiple installed). Make sure you can compile other C++11 programs. We've never been defining such a flag.
